article:
Many children like _ TV. It's very interesting. They can see a lot and _ many things about other people. Of course, they can learn on the radio, but they can learn better and more easily with TV. Why? Because they can hear and watch  at the same time . But they  can't watch anything on the radio.
TV helps to  _ children's eyes. TV helps to open their minds(,), too. They can _  better ways to do things. Many children watch TV only _ Saturday and Sunday evening. They are very _ . But a few students watch TV every night. They go to bed  late . Be careful! Watching TV too much is bad for their eyes.
